Usagi Tsukino (月野 うさぎ, Tsukino Usagi, renamed "Serena Tsukino" or "Bunny Tsukino" in some foreign adaptations), better known as Sailor Moon (セーラームーン, Sērā Mūn), is a  Japanese superheroine and the main protagonist and title character of the Sailor Moon manga series written by Naoko Takeuchi
She is introduced in chapter #1, "Usagi – Sailor Moon" (originally published in Japan's Nakayoshi magazine on December 28, 1991), as a carefree Japanese schoolgirl who can transform into Sailor Moon

Initially believing herself to be an ordinary girl, she is later revealed to be the reincarnated form of the Princess of the Moon Kingdom, and she subsequently discovers her original name, Princess Serenity (プリンセス・セレニティ, Purinsesu Sereniti).
Na Sailor Moon, Usagi zutere Luna, nwamba ojii na-ekwu okwu nke na-achọ Princess Moon
Luna kpughere na Usagi ga-azọpụta ụwa n'aka ike nke ihe ọjọọ ma nye ya brọsh iji gbanwee ghọọ Sailor Moon
Ọ rịọrọ Usagi ka ọ guzobe ndị Sailor Guardians, chọta adaeze ha ma chebe "Silver Crystal"
Ka Usagi na-etolite, ọ na-aghọ onye agha dị ike ma na-echebe mbara ala nna ya, Ụwa, site na ndị ọjọọ chọrọ imerụ ya ahụ
A na-egosipụta Usagi dị ka onye na-enweghị nchegbu na onye obi ụtọ, mana na-enwe àgwà mkpu ụmụaka nke na-egosi onwe ha mgbe ihe na-agaghị ya.

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Usagi na-apụta na ihe nkiri ọ bụla, ihe nkiri, egwuregwu vidio, na telivishọn pụrụ iche nke mmegharị anime, Sailor Moon na Sailor Moon Crystal; yana mmegharị ihe omume ndụ, Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon
Ọ bịakwara na usoro nwanne nwanyị Codename: Sailor V
Ọ bụla isiokwu nke parodies wee pụta na mmemme pụrụ iche
Ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị Western ka ewebatara Usagi na-apụta na anime Sailor Moon, nke bụ mmegharị nke usoro manga
Nnabata nke Usagi dị oke egwu abụrụla nke ọma na a matara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị dike nwanyị kachasị mkpa na ewu ewu n'oge niile.
